META.TITLE: Socrate, the 1st European social network for knowledge sharing.
META.DESCRIPTION: Learn and share all your knowledge. Download the mobile, web and iPad application.

HERO.HEADLINE_1: The 1st European social network in Europe of

ONE.HEADLINE_1: Learn and share all your knowledge on the
ONE.PARAGRAPH:
As a learner, you will find exactly what you are looking for to progress.
Courses, events, training, podcasts, fact sheets, and most importantly...Mentors.

As a Mentor, you will share your knowledge in any field.
Online or face-to-face, to one or dozens of learners simultaneously.
The choice is yours.

TWO.HEADLINE_3: everything you love. Exchange and progress together on a daily basis.
TWO.PARAGRAPH:
Build your feed around what you like by choosing your 3 themes or by discovering those of other members.

Thanks to the feed, put forward your knowledge and participate in the birth of a collective intelligence without limits.

THREE.HEADLINE_3: and your transactions with a master's hand!
THREE.PARAGRAPH:
Socrate gives you all the tools you need to do what you do best, share.

Manage your transactions easily and transfer your income to your bank account.

PRE_FOOTER.TITLE:
Socrate's ambition is to put the
human being and their knowledge
centre of a strong movement.
PRE_FOOTER.PARAGRAPH: That of a collective intelligence without limits.

FOOTER.HDF:
Socrate receives financial support from
the Hauts-de-France Region

COOKIES.DISCLAIMER: This site uses cookies and gives you control over their activation.
